alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Caldwell; Jackson; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 06 at 8:55PM CDT until July 06 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CALDWELL, SOUTHERN JACKSON, SOUTH CENTRAL OUACHITA, NORTHERN WINN, SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND NORTHEASTERN NATCHITOCHES PARISHES... At 855 PM CDT, Trained weather spotters reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Jonesboro, Columbia, Clarks, Grayson, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Dodson, East Hodge, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Calvin, Bienville, Sikes, Hudson, Vixen, Kelly, Friendship and Spaulding. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Caldwell; Jackson; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn
